name: Customer Success Manager
description: Responsible for customer health, retention, and expansion

role.title: Customer Success Manager / Account Manager
role.decision_authority: Tool adoption for personal workflow, input on CS team tools

pains: Managing too many accounts means missing early churn signals
QBR prep takes hours that could be spent with customers
Expansion opportunities are buried in call notes
Can't scale personalization with current book of business
Health scores don't reflect actual customer sentiment
success_criteria: Spot churn risk before it's too late
Prepare for QBRs quickly with relevant insights
evaluation_heuristics: Will this help me be more personal, not less?
Can I trust the health signals it surfaces?
Does it help me prioritize my time effectively?
Will customers feel surveilled or supported?
fears: AI flagging false positives that waste time
Missing the human touch that builds relationships
Customers feeling analyzed rather than valued
